title: His Trust: The Faithful Devotion and Self-Sacrifice of an Old Negro Servant

metadata.Plot: A Confederate officer is called off to war. He leaves his wife and daughter in the care of George, his faithful Negro servant. After the officer is killed in an exciting battle sequence, George continues in his caring duties, faithful to his trust. Events continue to turn for the worse when invading Yankee soldiers arrive to loot and torch the widow's home. George saves the officer's daughter and battle sword by braving the flames.
metadata.Actors: Wilfred Lucas, Dell Henderson, Claire McDowell
